about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of medieval battles and heroic deeds! In this game you will go on an exciting journey through the era of knightly tournaments and great battles. You have to take on the role of a wise ruler who must protect his people from enemies and expand his possessions.
Your task is to capture all the towers on the map by controlling your troops using your computer mouse and keyboard. To send troops into battle, simply click on your tower and drag it to the enemy's tower. Be careful and be strategic with every step, because your opponents are also striving for victory.
With each new level, the difficulty of the game will increase, offering you more and more interesting and challenging tasks. But don’t be afraid of difficulties, because with every victory you will become stronger and more confident.
Good luck in battle, brave ruler! May your strategy and courage lead you to victory!

Features:
  • Simple intuitive operation;
  • The game is suitable for all ages;
  • Nice graphics.
